TopicTitle: [WIP] Nova's Plernets, a Kopernicus mod dev thread- Stockalike GP2 and GP3!

Articles.Content:
In the creator of this mod, I can bump it's thread for boo reason is I want to. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

OK, fine. Here's a reason: I figured out what the problem was thanks to Janet, and tomorrow I will fix it and give dev releases to all the contributors... Which are only two people...

Anyway, this mod's development is no longer halted! Now to sleep, then do some stuff! Mod stuff!

Oh, cool.

And when I get the dev mod, is it okay if I change the description of Meander and its moons?

Well, its only moons right now are Eeloo and Fluff, and I saw someone on the following rums a while ago that writes descriptions for things, but I do want to see what yours would look like. So go ahead and change the descriptions.

I have a new name for this mod.

Nova's Plernets!

> 
> I have a new name for this mod.
> Nova's Plernets!

I like it! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Need any more help with Names/Descriptions? I'll be happy to contribute.

You can add and modify Cotilla and other bodies after I fix up Fluff. AND stop Kerbin from disappearing.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-20T00:51:53Z" title="06/20/2015 12:51  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 20, 2015</time> by Interplanet Janet**
Well, my goal at the moment is just to get the planets to actually show up, so maybe later. Science shoots, descriptions, etc.
Fluff won't show up, but I have a cloud config working fine and stuff.
I don't know if we can stop Kerbin from disappearing, unless we remove it from the game.

Wait. Kerbin's disappearing now? And also:

-Yay, clouds!

-Wait, meander's working? Absolutely nothing came up for me.

-thanks, guys!
I just replaced the config, but Fluff still is disappearing.

Problem solved! It needed a template after all!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-20T02:54:35Z" title="06/20/2015 02:54  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 20, 2015</time> by Interplanet Janet**

yay! Fluff's working!

Well, It might need some tweaking, though...

> 
> ![Oa7O8EH.png](http://i.imgur.com/Oa7O8EH.png)
> 
>

I sorta like it like that.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-20T14:07:36Z" title="06/20/2015 02:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 20, 2015</time> by Interplanet Janet**

Well, it's not very stockalike that way...

Although it's true that my idea of Fluff is kinda boring. To make up for that, it was going to be in the rings themselves, so it would be pretty.
I also decided for it to be in a subsynchronous, highly-inclined and eccentric orbit, that sometimes passes near the rings.
Yeah, and I don't know about that either, but then again, it's kinda boring otherwise.
I've added Squash and removed Fluff's height map. I'll test them out sooner or later.
Apparently I've tested out Squash, and it seems to look just like Minmus (the template is Minmus). I added the map and everything!

I have an idea for 2 moons. 

Pebble

A VERY small moon, makes Gilly look like Eve in comparison. The size of about 5 E class asteroids. 0.05 Gs

Located in the middle of the rings, which cut it in half.

Another moon, I don't have a name yet though

About the size and gravity of Minmus, but with an atmosphere of 40 km high. This will make planes VERY interesting here..... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Also, make GP2 have oxygen. Just for fun, ya know. And make the rings bigger, like Saturn.
Already did the latter. Will probably add the others.

Cool looking planet! It would be pretty cool to make a biome that you can only reach by flying low through the canyons and put water resources in them. 

That blue though, it clashes horribly with the tan. I think you need something less saturated and I think either greener or purpler. Something translucent and shiny too, but I don't know if that's really hard to do.

> 
> I have an idea for 2 moons. 
> Pebble
> 
> A VERY small moon, makes Gilly look like Eve in comparison. The size of about 5 E class asteroids. 0.05 Gs
> 
> Located in the middle of the rings, which cut it in half.
> 
> Another moon, I don't have a name yet though
> 
> About the size and gravity of Minmus, but with an atmosphere of 40 km high. This will make planes VERY interesting here..... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> 
> Also, make GP2 have oxygen. Just for fun, ya know. And make the rings bigger, like Saturn.

Actually, this is all based off Nova's planet concepts. They are good ideas, but they don't fit in with this mod.

- - - Updated - - -

..but the oxygen idea seems reasonable. However, I think it should be on Egar (GP3) instead, since it will be waaaay too hard to land on.

- - - Updated - - -

...and the second moon idea is basically kinda like Bunt.

I'm trying out Squash again, after checking out some stuff from New Horizons. Hope all goes well.

- - - Updated - - -

Breadsticks! Squash STILL looks like Minmus in map view!
